scripts.docsync: git fetch && git pull && git push
scripts.netlifydeploy: yarn && yarn buildts && yarn workspace @collaborated/web snowpack build
scripts.docsend: git add docs && git subtree push --prefix docs origin gh-pages && git push
scripts.mbuildlinux: cd services/manager && go build -v -x -o ../../../capp main.go && cd ../../
scripts.mbuildwin: cd services/manager && go build -v -x -o ../../../capp.exe main.go && cd ../../
scripts.build: yarn && yarn workspace scripts tsc && yarn workspace scripts node dist/build.js -v
